channel.title: Gauntlet Comics: Hit the Streets in July
channel.description:
During its July Kickstarter, I'm running my new game *Hit the Streets: Defend the Block*. ![](upload://ijP37WmcDdoiBSfGBhenbPChE6r.png) It's a hack of *1%er, the Outlaw Biker Game* from Creepy Doll Studios for street-level supers.
This game is for street-level super teams, folks who fight villains in big city neighborhoods rather than across the globe. We'll create a neighborhood in New Gauntlet City, figure out what your team fights for and against, then dig into their lives and struggles.
Think of the Netflix Defenders show, not the Avengers movies.
-----------------------------------
This game is part of the ongoing Gauntlet Comics series. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the Gauntlet Comics canon (and on our wiki) for future miniseries. Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
The X-Card safety tool will be on the table. For more information on the Gauntlet's safety tools, please refer to our Inclusivity Policy on the website (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html)
This game session will be **BROADCAST LIVE for curious folks to see the game in action!**
[date=2019-07-02 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-02 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 01 of 05](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhbtezcDBboP_kbnCmS) [date=2019-07-09 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-09 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 02 of 05](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhbtinSaGnh779sWSVr) [date=2019-07-16 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-16 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 03 of 05](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhbtlQQldAVlrXScoNW) [date=2019-07-23 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-23 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 04 of 05](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhbtnznpP_WRPrHhq6r) [date=2019-07-30 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-30 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 05 of 05](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lhbtr6Xy-MIdwBwK8K7)

item.title: Gauntlet Comics: Hit the Streets in July
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

During its July Kickstarter, I’m running my new game Hit the Streets: Defend the Block.

It’s a hack of 1%er, the Outlaw Biker Game from Creepy Doll Studios for street-level supers.

This game is for street-level super teams, folks who fight villains in big city neighborhoods rather than across the globe. We’ll create a neighborhood in New Gauntlet City, figure out what your team fights for and against, then dig into their lives and struggles.

Think of the Netflix Defenders show, not the Avengers movies.

This game is part of the ongoing Gauntlet Comics series. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the Gauntlet Comics canon (and on our wiki) for future miniseries. Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.

The X-Card safety tool will be on the table. For more information on the Gauntlet’s safety tools, please refer to our Inclusivity Policy on the website (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html)

This game session will be BROADCAST LIVE for curious folks to see the game in action!
